Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates by stating that Donald Trump has the smallest penis the sex worker has ever seen.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it is based on the account of a single sex worker without any corroborating evidence.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the account of a Russian sex worker is credible and accurate without providing any evidence to support this assumption.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that it originated from a fake news site, the World News Daily Report, which is known for publishing false information.
Exist alternative explanation: An alternative explanation is that the claim was fabricated or made up by the sex worker for personal or political reasons.
Falters at times: The claim falters at times by presenting information that is not accurate or reliable, such as using unrelated photographs to accompany the article.
Understate: There is no evidence of any understatement bias in the claim.
